SEARCH
Package us.ullberg.startpunkt.graphql

Class ApplicationGraphQLResource

java.lang.Object
us.ullberg.startpunkt.graphql.ApplicationGraphQLResource
@GraphQLApi @ApplicationScoped public class ApplicationGraphQLResource extends Object
GraphQL API resource for applications. Provides queries for retrieving applications with optional tag filtering and grouping.

      kubernetesClient - the Kubernetes client
      availabilityCheckService - the availability check service
      applicationService - the application service for CRUD operations
      eventBroadcaster - the event broadcaster for WebSocket notifications
      cacheManager - the cache manager for manual cache invalidation
      subscriptionEventEmitter - the subscription event emitter for GraphQL subscriptions

  • Method Details

    • getApplicationGroups

      @Query("applicationGroups") @Description("Retrieve application groups, optionally filtered by tags") public List<ApplicationGroupType> getApplicationGroups(@Name("tags") @Description("Optional tags to filter applications") List<String> tags)
      Retrieve application groups, optionally filtered by tags.
      Parameters:
      tags - optional list of tags to filter applications
      Returns:
      list of application groups

    • getApplication

      @Query("application") @Description("Retrieve a single application by group and name") public ApplicationType getApplication(@Name("groupName") @Description("The group name of the application") String groupName, @Name("appName") @Description("The name of the application") String appName)
      Retrieve a single application by group and name.
      Parameters:
      groupName - the group name
      appName - the application name
      Returns:
      the application if found, null otherwise

    • createApplication

      @Mutation("createApplication") @Description("Create a new application") public ApplicationType createApplication(@NonNull @Name("input") @NonNull CreateApplicationInput input)
      Create a new application.
      Parameters:
      input - the application creation input
      Returns:
      the created application

    • updateApplication

      @Mutation("updateApplication") @Description("Update an existing application") public ApplicationType updateApplication(@NonNull @Name("input") @NonNull UpdateApplicationInput input)
      Update an existing application.
      Parameters:
      input - the application update input
      Returns:
      the updated application

    • deleteApplication

      @Mutation("deleteApplication") @Description("Delete an application") public Boolean deleteApplication(@NonNull @Name("namespace") @NonNull String namespace, @NonNull @Name("name") @NonNull String name)
      Delete an application.
      Parameters:
      namespace - the namespace of the application
      name - the name of the application resource
      Returns:
      true if deleted successfully

    • subscribeToApplicationUpdates

      @Subscription("applicationUpdates") @Description("Subscribe to real-time application updates with optional filtering") public io.smallrye.mutiny.Multi<ApplicationUpdateEvent> subscribeToApplicationUpdates(@Name("namespace") @Description("Optional namespace filter") String namespace, @Name("tags") @Description("Optional tags to filter applications") List<String> tags)
      Subscribe to real-time application updates.

      Clients can subscribe to this to receive notifications when applications are added, updated, or removed. Optional filtering by namespace and tags is supported.

      Parameters:
      namespace - optional namespace filter (only events for this namespace will be sent)
      tags - optional list of tags to filter applications
      Returns:
      Multi stream of application update events

    • subscribeToApplicationsAdded

      @Subscription("applicationAdded") @Description("Subscribe to notifications when new applications are added") public io.smallrye.mutiny.Multi<ApplicationType> subscribeToApplicationsAdded()
      Subscribe to new applications being added.
      Returns:
      Multi stream of new applications

    • subscribeToApplicationsRemoved

      @Subscription("applicationRemoved") @Description("Subscribe to notifications when applications are removed") public io.smallrye.mutiny.Multi<ApplicationType> subscribeToApplicationsRemoved()
      Subscribe to applications being removed.
      Returns:
      Multi stream of removed applications

    • subscribeToApplicationsUpdated

      @Subscription("applicationUpdated") @Description("Subscribe to notifications when applications are updated") public io.smallrye.mutiny.Multi<ApplicationType> subscribeToApplicationsUpdated()
      Subscribe to applications being updated.
      Returns:
      Multi stream of updated applications
